structuralFindings.aiTeamStructure: Two new presidents joined the leadership team: Dr. Carole Ho (President of Lilly Neuroscience) and Anne White (President of Lilly Immunology), participating in their first earnings call. No specific A

quotes.text: We recently announced a new collaboration with NVIDIA to open a co-innovation AI lab.
quotes.speaker: David Ricks
quotes.context: Q4 2025 earnings call, discussing AI investments

quotes.text: This project will combine Lilly's scientific expertise with NVIDIA's leading technology to accelerate drug discovery.
quotes.speaker: David Ricks
quotes.context: Describing the NVIDIA co-innovation lab purpose

summary: NVIDIA co-innovation AI lab announced: Eli Lilly announced a new collaboration with NVIDIA to open a co-innovation AI lab combining Lilly's scientific expertise with NVIDIA's leading technology to accelerate drug discovery. The partnership New therapeutic area president structure: Two new presidents joined the leadership team: Dr. Carole Ho (President of Lilly Neuroscience) and Anne White (President of Lilly Immunology), participating in their first earnings call. No specific A Massive R&D pipeline acceleration: Daniel Skovronsky highlighted 36 active Phase III programs and 14 new Phase III programs initiated recently. 39 business development transactions completed in 2025. AI investment framed as supporting  $55B+ manufacturing expansion since 2020: Over $55 billion committed to manufacturing expansion since 2020, with AI as a separate innovation priority. New manufacturing sites in Wisconsin and North Carolina beginning production.
